info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 28 at 6:57PM CDT until May 28 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR BEAVER AND TEXAS COUNTIES... At 657 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles south of Feterita, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Guymon, Beaver, Hooker, Goodwell, Tyrone, Forgan, Optima, Hardesty, Gate, Knowles, Elmwood, Hough, Adams, Boyd, Floris, Eva, Bryans Corner, Baker, Mocane and Turpin. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
